评论详情: Its a perfect bag for guys, i use it to place my lunch bag in it, and a sketch pad and pencils. Its tiny but mighty. I love the color, it looks masculin, and my friends even got one… 3 of them. It has a magnet to clip it shut, its easy to open at events or at work for bag inspection, and its easy to keep clean. Overall, i love it, and its great tk travel with.

评论概述: Size small is big enough for diapers and wipes
评论详情: First of all, it's the same purple shown in the photos. Integrity in purples is important.  Ok. The other thing I like about this bag is that it's exactly the right size to hold a full pack of baby wipes (can lay it down or stand it upright) and a bundle of diapers, plus a phone and a book and an extra onesie and whatever else I need to take to parties, while still being a purse rather than a big puffy diaper bag. That's what I was looking for and this is it.

I liked the bag but it was too small for what i needed so returned. The shoulder strap was good thickness, no zippers. Quality i think seemed good. Material probably won't get dirty easy but should be able to wash since it's fabric. Would be good travel little bag, i just decided to get same type and material but bigger.

I prefer the smaller bag for everyday use & the bigger bag for travel necessities. I’ve used these bags for a few years now & I'm overall satisfied. I’ve had issues with things falling out because they only have one button & no zipper. A lighter color may be better as they attracts lint.

Don’t like big purses but this hold my Vera bulky wallet, phone keys, chapstick and travel bottle of lotion just fine w room to spare! Cute purse to grab and go! Can wear over shoulder too!!!

I love this little bag. It’s perfect for my Bible, a notebook and other odds and ends. I like the little pocket as well. I gave it 4 stars because the long strap doesn’t have the option to be removed.

评论详情: this bag is so perfectly made, the only downside is the size. they don’t have a medium! 😭 the color is a BEAUTIFUL beige, it’s very nice and comforting due to the strap it has! they should make it with a zipper cause where i live, there’s pocket pickers, so definitely a note id add as a customer who would’ve bought more than 1 is add a zipper and make a medium size. my iPad 9th gen didn’t fit and since the sole purpose of this bag was to use it for Bible studies; i, unfortunately cannot due to the size and closing situation so sadly it’ll be refunded :(

Great material, PERFECT size. Great for my bible and notebook. Enough extra room for my wallet, keys, small lotion, feminine products, pens and highlighter. It EXACTLY what I was looking for!!

This is the perfect size bag, just a little above small - can fit your wallet, phone, small book or planner, and the other usually purse things like chapstick and small toiletries. The material is really soft, and I get a lot of compliments on this bag.  If you’re the type to have a lot of little things in your bag getting a purse organizer might be a good idea since this doesn’t have any small pockets other than the one in front, but I always use a purse organizer anyway.

This product was so cute when it first arrived. I believe I received it only two weeks ago. However, I guess it’s not meant for daily use. The shoulder strap came undone from the stitches while I was in a store. I checked the other end of the strap in my car and it looked like it was going to come loose too. I actually really liked using it while it lasted though. The feel of the material is nice, it’s a good size for casual use and quicks runs out of the house, and I loved the outside pocket as it made it very easy to grab my phone or keys. I just wish that the bag was more durable and lasted years instead of two weeks. Also, when packaging the bag, it was all folded up into the thirds and was all bent up when I first got it and I needed to shape it which was annoying.
Good quality , wish it had more compartments

If you do want to keep the strap that's sewed on it IS a different color than the bag itself of that helps (last picture).

评论概述: Perfect size for personal carry on item
评论详情: Roomy with a waterproof lining. Only the one pocket, but that pocket is just right for holding a tablet and keeping it separate from the contents of the bag. Came with an adjustable shoulder strap so it could be carried as a crossbody. The corduroy fabric is durable and the bag is lightweight. I used this as my additional personal carry on item and it fit perfectly under the seat in front of me. The flat bottom I keeps it stable. Snap closure is surprisingly strong. Love the color (blue). Though it is not especially fashionable, it served my needs for the right price.

评论概述: Good but could use some improvements
评论详情: When I first bought the bag they sent me the larger one by mistake so I reordered the small again and seeing the two there is a definite quality difference between the two. The big bag comes with a corduroy strap that feels sturdier and looks prettier and it comes with a hard sheet that sits at the bottom so it has more structure. The small bag, although a more convenient size for my everyday needs, comes with a very simple woven strap and no hard bottom so it loses all structural integrity. Not sure why these cheaper changes were made for the smaller version but it definitely reduces likeability. However, I'm going to keep it cause for right now it suits what I need and it can fit my water bottle, and umbrella, my wallet, and a book.
I’m buying this in multiple colors! This fits everything and is the perfect size!

This bag is the perfect size to carry my micro PC to and from work, along with a hardcover book, my kindle Paperwhite, wallet, and a small water bottle. I wish the base was sewn in so that the bottom was always flat.
